title: Live Point Home Feed Selection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a live game is in-progress
AND videoFeeds for the game have a mediaState of MEDIA_ON
AND the user is entitled to watch the game
AND the user has not previously played the feed
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a game tile for a live in-progress game
AND selects the home video feed button in the Feed Select Modal
AND selects the [Watch Live] button in the Secondary Feed Select Modal
custom_expected:
THEN the feed select modal/games page is dismissed
AND the video player maximizes to full screen
AND the home video feed starts playing from the live point

title: Watch From Beginning Home Feed Selection - Live Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a live game is in-progress
AND videoFeeds for the game have a mediaState of MEDIA_ON
AND the user is entitled to watch the game
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a game tile for a live in-progress game
AND selects the home video feed button in the Feed Select Modal
AND selects the [Start From The Beginning] button in the Secondary Feed Select Modal
custom_expected:
THEN the feed select modal/games page is dismissed
AND the video player maximizes to full screen
AND the home video feed starts playing from the broadcast start point

title: Resume Home Feed Selection - Live Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a live game is in-progress
AND videoFeeds for the game have a mediaState of MEDIA_ON
AND the user is entitled to watch the game
AND the user has previously played the feed
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a game tile for a live in-progress game
AND selects the home video feed button in the Feed Select Modal
AND selects the [Resume] button in the Secondary Feed Select Modal
custom_expected:
THEN the feed select modal/games page is dismissed
AND the video player maximizes to full screen
AND the home video feed starts playing from the bookmarked/last watched point

title: Live Point National Feed Selection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a live game is in-progress
AND the game only has a national feed
AND videoFeeds for the game have a mediaState of MEDIA_ON
AND the user has the appropriate entitlements to watch the national feed

**Example:**
Fox Saturday Baseball w/ MLBALL entitlement
AppleTV+ w/ EXEC entitlement
Peacock w/ EXEC entitlement
ESPN Sunday Night Baseball w/ EXEC entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a game tile for a live in-progress game
AND selects the national video feed button in the Feed Select Modal
AND selects the [Watch Live] button in the Secondary Feed Select Modal
custom_expected:
THEN the feed select modal/games page is dismissed
AND the video player maximizes to full screen
AND the national video feed starts playing from the live point

title: Watch From Beginning National Feed Selection
custom_preconds:

AND the game only has a national feed

AND the user has the appropriate entitlements to watch the national feed

**Example:**
Fox Saturday Baseball w/ MLBALL entitlement
AppleTV+ w/ EXEC entitlement
Peacock w/ EXEC entitlement
ESPN Sunday Night Baseball w/ EXEC entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a game tile for a live in-progress game
AND selects the national video feed button in the Feed Select Modal
AND selects the [Start From The Beginning] button in the Secondary Feed Select Modal
custom_expected:
THEN the feed select modal/games page is dismissed
AND the video player maximizes to full screen
AND the national video feed starts playing from the beginning of the broadcast

title: National Feed Blackout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a live game has a national broadcast video feed
AND the logged in user is entitled to the feed
AND the user is in a blacked out market

**Example:** 
FOX Saturday Baseball
ESPN Sunday Night Baseball
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a game tile for a live national game
custom_expected:
THEN a modal displays with the match up at the top
AND a the following blackout message displays "This game is unavailable in your area. All Regular Season and Postseason live games are subject to blackout restrictions due to Major League Baseball exclusivities. An archive copy of the game will be available 90 minutes after the game."

title: Archive Game Home feed without bookmarks
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user navigates to a past day with games
AND the game has a home feed
AND videoFeeds for the game have a mediaState of MEDIA_ARCHIVE
AND the user has the appropriate entitlements to watch archive games
AND the user has not previously played the home feed of the archive game
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects a game tile for an archive game
AND selects the home video feed button in the Feed Select Modal
custom_expected:
THEN the feed select modal/games page is dismissed
AND the video player maximizes to full screen
AND the home video feed starts playing from the beginning of the feed

title: Condensed Game - Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has selected a game tile for an archive game
AND the Feed Select modal is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the [Condensed Game] button
custom_expected:
THEN playback of the Condensed Game is initiated at the beginning of the video
AND the condensed game video is for the game/game tile that was selected
AND the video player is dismissed once playback has completed
AND focus is assigned to the previously selected game tile

title: Condensed Game - Playback dismiss
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has selected a game tile for an archive game
AND the user has initiated playback of a Condensed Game from the Feed Select modal
AND the scrubber bar is not displaying in the video player
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the CIRCLE button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the video player is dismissed
AND focus is assigned to the previously selected game tile

title: Game Recap - Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has selected a game tile for an archive game
AND the Feed Select modal is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the [Recap] button
custom_expected:
THEN playback of the Game Recap is initiated at the beginning of the video
AND the Game Recap video is for the game/game tile that was selected
AND the video player is dismissed once playback has completed
AND focus is assigned to the previously selected game tile

title: Game Recap - Playback dismiss
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has selected a game tile for an archive game
AND the user has initiated playback of a Game Recap from the Feed Select modal
AND the scrubber bar is not displaying in the video player
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the CIRCLE button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the video player is dismissed
AND focus is assigned to the previously selected game tile

title: ***Currently N/A*** Home Audio Selection - Feed Selection
custom_preconds:
Have a build installed

Sign in with an Audio Only account
custom_steps:
1. From The Home menu select a game modal.
2. Home Audio and away audio feeds appear.
3. Select a home audio modal.
4. Appropriate Audio is heard.
5. Select secondary Home Audio modal if present
6. Appropriate Audio is heard.
custom_expected: Appropriate Audio is heard from Home Audio Modals from Game tiles

title: ***Currently N/A*** Away Audio Selection - Feed Selection
custom_preconds: A Build is installed and a the user signs in with a Audio Only Account
custom_steps:
1. From The Home menu select a game modal.
2. Away audio feeds appear.
3. Select an away audio modal.
4. Appropriate Audio is heard.
5. Select secondary Away Audio modal if present
6. Appropriate Audio is heard.
custom_expected: Appropriate Away Audio is heard from the Away Audio Modals on the Home Screen

title: ***Currently N/A*** Secondary Audio Feed
Empty Feed Selection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is logged in
AND the subscriber is on the Games page
AND the displayed date with games is in the future
AND games have videoFeeds with a mediaState of MEDIA_OFF
AND the subscriber is entitled
AND the subscriber is not blacked out
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a game tile for a scheduled game
custom_expected:
THEN the Feed Select modal displays
AND the Away team logo/colors should be visible top left
AND the Home team logo/colors should be visible top right
AND a broadcast tower icon is displayed
AND the following text is displayed "You're a bit early! There are no feeds available yet. Please come back later."
AND the user cannot navigate through elements behind the modal

title: Live/In-Progress Game Feed Select Modal UI Design - Live single feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is logged in
AND the subscriber is on the Games page
AND games have videoFeeds with a mediaState of MEDIA_ON
AND only a single feed is available
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a game tile for a live/in-progress game
custom_expected:
THEN the Feed Select modal displays
AND the Away team logo/colors should be visible top left
AND the Home team logo/colors should be visible top right
AND a video icon followed by the text "Video" is displayed centered above the video feed button
AND the video feed button displays centered near the top of the feed select modal
AND the video feed button contains the home team abbreviation followed by the video feed call letters
AND the video feed button has focus
AND the user cannot navigate through elements behind the modal

title: Live/In-Progress Game Feed Select Modal UI Design - Home and Away feeds
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is logged in
AND the subscriber is on the Games page
AND games have videoFeeds with a mediaState of MEDIA_ON
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a game tile for a live/in-progress game
custom_expected:
THEN the Feed Select modal displays
AND the Away team logo/colors should be visible top left
AND the Home team logo/colors should be visible top right
AND a video icon followed by the text "Video" is displayed centered above the away and home video feed buttons
AND the away video feed button displays on the left side of the feed select modal
AND the away video feed button contains the team abbreviation followed by the video feed call letters
AND the away video feed button has focus
AND the away video feed button decreases in size slightly when it loses focus
AND the home video feed button displays on the right side of the feed select modal
AND the home video feed button contains the team abbreviation followed by the video feed call letters
AND the home video feed button does not have focus
AND the home video feed button increases in size slightly when it has focus
AND the user cannot navigate through elements behind the modal

title: Dismiss Feed Select Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Games page
AND a user selects a game tile
custom_steps: WHEN presses the [O] button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the feed modal is dismissed
AND the user is on the Games page
AND the previously selected game tile has focus

title: Dismiss Secondary Feed Select Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Games page
AND a user selects a game tile for a live/in-progress game
AND the user selects a video feed
custom_steps: WHEN presses the [O] button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the secondary feed modal is dismissed
AND the first feed modal is displayed
AND the previously selected feed button has focus

title: Secondary Feed modal for In-Progress Live Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscribers is entitled to watch live games
AND a live game is in-progress
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a video feed option in the Feed Select modal
custom_expected:
THEN the Secondary Feed Select modal displays
AND the Away team logo/colors should be visible top left
AND the Home team logo/colors should be visible top right
AND a [Watch Live] button is displayed center justified with focus
AND a [Start From The Beginning] button is displayed center justified below the [Watch Live] button
AND the user cannot navigate through elements behind the modal

title: Secondary Feed modal for In-Progress Live Games w/ a video bookmark
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscribers is entitled to watch live games
AND a live game is in-progress
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a video feed option in the Feed Select modal
custom_expected:
THEN the Secondary Feed Select modal displays
AND the Away team logo/colors should be visible top left
AND the Home team logo/colors should be visible top right
AND a [Resume] button is displayed center justified with focus
AND a [Watch Live] button is displayed center justified below the [Resume] button
AND a [Start From The Beginning] button is displayed center justified below the [Watch Live] button
AND the user cannot navigate through elements behind the modal

title: Feed modal for Archive Games - Home and Away feeds
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is logged in
AND the subscriber is on the Games page
AND the displayed date is in the past
AND games have videoFeeds with a mediaState of MEDIA_ARCHIVE
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a game tile for an archive game
custom_expected:
THEN the Feed Select modal displays
AND the Away team logo/colors should be visible top left
AND the Home team logo/colors should be visible top right
AND a button labeled "Recap", is displayed center justified, below the matchup header
AND a button labeled "Condensed Game" is displayed center justified, below the "Recap" button
AND a video icon followed by the text "Video" is displayed centered above the away and home video feed buttons
AND the away video feed button displays on the left side of the feed select modal
AND the away video feed button contains the team abbreviation followed by the video feed call letters
AND the away video feed button has focus
AND the away video feed button decreases in size slightly when it loses focus
AND the home video feed button displays on the right side of the feed select modal
AND the home video feed button contains the team abbreviation followed by the video feed call letters
AND the home video feed button does not have focus
**Feature not implemented** AND the home video feed button increases in size slightly when it has focus
AND the user cannot navigate through elements behind the modal

title: Feed modal for Archive Games - single feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is logged in
AND the subscriber is on the Games page
AND the displayed date is in the past
AND games have videoFeeds with a mediaState of MEDIA_ARCHIVE
AND only a single feed is available
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a game tile for an archive game
custom_expected:
THEN the Feed Select modal displays
AND the Away team logo/colors should be visible top left
AND the Home team logo/colors should be visible top right
AND a button labeled "Recap", is displayed center justified, below the matchup header
AND a button labeled "Condensed Game" is displayed center justified, below the "Recap" button
AND a video icon followed by the text "Video" is displayed centered above the video feed button
AND the video feed button displays centered near the top of the feed select modal
AND the video feed button contains the home team abbreviation followed by the video feed call letters
AND the video feed button has focus
AND the user cannot navigate through elements behind the modal

title: Secondary Feed modal for Archive Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscribers is entitled to watch archive games
AND an archive feed has been previously played/has a bookmark
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a video feed option in the Feed Select modal
custom_expected:
THEN the Secondary Feed Select modal displays
AND the Away team logo/colors should be visible top left
AND the Home team logo/colors should be visible top right
AND a [Resume] button is displayed center justified with focus
AND a [Start From The Beginning] button is displayed center justified below the [Resume] button
AND the user cannot navigate through elements behind the modal

title: Feed Modal size adjusts to content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is logged in
AND archive games are available
AND a live in-progress game is avalable
custom_steps: WHEN the user views different Feed Select modals
custom_expected:
THEN the modal adjusts in size
AND there is not an over excess of space in the modal

title: No Feeds Available - Spring Training
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled or not entitled to a game
AND a game is in-progress
AND there are no video feeds available for the game

**Note:** Not entitled is valid until PS5TV-209 is implemented
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the game tile
custom_expected: THEN "No Broadcast Available" displays below the Video header in the Feed Select modal

title: Blackedout No Feeds Available - Spring Training
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is blackedout of a game
AND the blackedout game has no feeds available
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the game tile for the game that is blackedout and has no feeds available
custom_expected:
THEN the Feed Select modal displays
AND the team logos and colors are displayed in the matchup header
AND the "Blackout Market" message is displayed
AND the video icon/title is not displayed
AND "No Broadcast Available" is not displayed

title: Not Entitled No Feeds Available - Spring Training
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is not entitled to a game
AND the not entitled game has no feeds available
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the game tile for a not entitled game that has no feeds available
custom_expected:
THEN the Feed Select modal displays
AND the team logos and colors are displayed in the matchup header
AND the video icon/title is displayed
AND "No Broadcast Available" is displayed

title: ESPN MVPD Messaging - Unauthorized and Not Entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Postseason game is on the schedule
AND ESPN broadcasters are assigned
AND the user doesn't have the following entitlements: MLBALL, MLBVIDEOADOBEPASS, MLBVIDEOAR
AND the user is unauthorized for ESPN MVPD
AND the game level entitledVideo = false
AND the AWAY (National) feed level espnAuthRequired = true

User types: atBat/Audio, Free, Anonymous users
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a game tile for an ESPN Postseason game tile
custom_expected:
THEN the Feed Select modal displays
AND ESPN MVPD messaging displays in the Feed Select modal

title: ESPN MVPD Messaging - Unauthorized and Entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Postseason game is on the schedule
AND ESPN broadcasters are assigned
AND the user has one of the following entitlements: MLBALL, MLBVIDEOADOBEPASS, MLBVIDEOAR
AND the user is unauthorized for ESPN MVPD
AND the game level entitledVideo = false
AND the AWAY (National) feed level espnAuthRequired = true

MLBALL, MLBVIDEOADOBEPASS, MLBVIDEOAR
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a game tile for an ESPN Postseason game tile
custom_expected:
THEN the Feed Select modal displays
AND ESPN MVPD messaging displays in the Feed Select modal

title: ESPN MVPD - Authorized
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Postseason game is on the schedule
AND ESPN broadcasters are assigned
AND the user has one of the following entitlements: MLBALL, MLBVIDEOADOBEPASS, MLBVIDEOAR
AND the user is authorized for ESPN MVPD
AND the game level entitledVideo = true
AND the AWAY (National) feed level espnAuthRequired = true
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a game tile for an ESPN Postseason game tile
custom_expected:

title: ESPN MVPD - Canada
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is located in Canada
AND a postseason game has ESPN broadcasters assigned
AND the away feed level espnAuthRequired = true
AND feed level mediaState = MEDIA_ON
custom_steps: WHEN the subscriber selects the ESPN postseason game tile
custom_expected:
THEN a blackout message is displayed
AND the user is unable to access feeds for the game
AND the Feed Modal is dismissed after the user presses the CIRCLE button on the controller

AND feed level mediaState = MEDIA_ON

AND the ESPN International (ESPN-INT) feed button is the only button displayed in the modal
AND the user is able to receive playback after selecting the feed button

title: Condensed Game
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a game tile for an archive game
custom_expected:
THEN a button labeled [Condensed Game] is displayed above the video feeds and below the [Recap] button, center justified in the feed select modal
AND focus is assigned to the [Condensed Game] button if the [Recap] button is not present

title: Game Recap
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a game tile for an archive game
custom_expected:
THEN a button labeled [Recap] is displayed above the [Condensed Game] button and video feeds, center justified in the feed select modal
AND focus is assigned to the [Recap] button

title: Full Subscriber Feed Select modal - Live
custom_preconds:
Entitlements/Users: 
MLBALL for yearly/monthly subscribers
MLBVIDEOADOBEPASS for Xtra Inning subscribers
MLBVIDEOAR for T-Mobile subscribers
custom_expected: THEN Away and home feed buttons display respectively, below the Video header

title: Full Subscriber Feed Select modal - Archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user with the MLBALL entitlement is logged in
OR a user with the MLBVIDEOADOBEPASS entitlement is logged in
OR a user with the MLBVIDEOAR entitlement is logged in
OR a user with the MLBEXEC entitlement is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects an archive game tile for a game they are entitled
custom_expected:
THEN "Recap" and "Condensed Game" buttons display, if present in the EPG or statsAPI response
AND available game feeds are displayed below the "Video" title
AND "Upgrade MLB.TV" button does not display
AND "Get MLB.TV" button does not display

title: Partial Subscriber Feed Select modal - Live
custom_preconds:
Entitlements/Users:
Single Team 
Free
Anonymous

title: Partial Subscriber Feed Select modal - Archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a free subscriber
OR a user is a single team subscriber
OR a user is not logged in/anonymous
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a game tile for a game they are not entitled
custom_expected:
THEN "Watch Free" is displayed above the Recap and Condensed Game buttons, if available
AND "Full Game Access" is displayed above a focused "Get MLB.TV" button, for not logged in/anonymous users
AND "Full Game Access" is displayed above a focused "Upgrade MLB.TV" button, for free users, and single team users that are not entitled to either team
